{/* Hero Section */}

GYAN DAYINI CLASSES

To achieve success, one must have positive thinking.

Primary to Secondary: Jr. KG to Class 10th
SSC & CBSE Boards | Professional by Mrs. Pinkee R. Prajapati

Email: gyandayiniclasses@gmail.com
Phone: +91 9198582342 / +91 8174997923
{/* About Section */}

About Us

Gyan Dayini Classes is committed to the all-round development and bright future of every child by providing quality education with a personal touch. Under the guidance of Mrs. Pinkee R. Prajapati (B.Sc + B.Ed, Internship in KVs), the school maintains a balance between academic excellence and holistic growth.

Our positive philosophy: "No student should miss out on education due to financial reasons," ensures inclusive and caring classroom environment.
